Custom message:  (error code 1) [Nested exception message:  Custom message: Unexpected reply: 550 /dpm/gup.uni-linz.ac.at/home/geclipse/StdOut.txt: No such file or directory.].  Nested exception is org.globus.ftp.exception.UnexpectedReplyCodeException:  Custom message: Unexpected reply: 550 /dpm/gup.uni-linz.ac.at/home/geclipse/StdOut.txt: No such file or directory.

Mateusz, can you have a look at this?

Isn't this due to the gLite bug
   https://savannah.cern.ch/bugs/index.php?30249
that i reported?
In that case it would only happen with 0-sized files in the DPM area of a DPM-SE. Anyways, some workaround/check in gEclipse until they fix their servers would be nice.
